item.description: Come one... come all... to our March meet-up group. All breeds are welcome for FREE social play and good ol' fashion fun! We have a specially designed doggy play area that is both indoor and outdoor for dogs to run around off leash. We provide toys, water, and clean up in the room.  Refreshments will be provided for dogs and humans too! Can't wait to see you there! Please make sure your pets are up to date on vaccines and spay/neut because they will be interacting with other dogs.
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk...

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Lucky March Meet-up
